name: Dodrio
effect: (This card cannot be used at official tournaments.)
author: Yukiko Baba
flavor_text: It collects data and plans three times as wisely, but it may think too much and fall into a state of immobility.

poke_body.name: Retreat Aid
poke_body.effect: As long as this Pokémon is on your Bench, your Active Pokémon’s Retreat Cost is {C}{C} less.

attacks.name: Incessant Peck
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 20 more damage for each heads.
